name: WATCH IT
description:
DESCRIPTION

You wake up in a dark room. You're alone, you're scared, and someone's preventing you from leaving, it seems you'll meet your end soon enough. Or will you try and change your fate?

Watch it is a short visual novel. Enjoy a story driven game with a simple point and click mechanism, and find out about the many possibilities you'll encounter.

CREATOR'S NOTE

Thank you for playing! This is our first game as a team and first game jam together, this was a great learning experience, so please leave us a comment so we can improve!

CREDITS

Erwan - Programming

Miiyuka - Art, Music, Writing
